snippet: About $407 million would be raised in a stock offering. The troubled airline’s largest investor, Air France-KLM, has not made a decision on raising its stake.
lead_paragraph: About $407 million would be raised in a stock offering. The troubled airline’s largest investor, Air France-KLM, has not made a decision on raising its stake.

headline.main: Alitalia Shareholders Agree to Stock Plan
headline.print_headline: Alitalia Shareholders Agree to Stock Plan
